snippet: Russia charged a reserve colonel with espionage on Tuesday for selling what officials said were classified topographical maps to the Pentagon.
abstract: Russia charges a reserve colonel, Vladimir Lazar, with espionage for selling what officials say are classified topographical maps to the Pentagon.
lead_paragraph: Russia charged a reserve colonel with espionage on Tuesday for selling what officials said were classified topographical maps to the Pentagon.

headline.main: Russia: Colonel Is Charged With Spying, Accused of Selling Map to U.S. Agent
headline.print_headline: Russia: Colonel Is Charged With Spying, Accused of Selling Map to U.S. Agent
